accept.description: Specify the desired file type. Note: file type should still be validated server-side, as this prop is not a complete validation. [Read more about the accept prop](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/accept)

element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider

i18nNoSelectionText.description: The text string displayed when no files are selected.

onChange.description: Function will run when the uploaded file changes

required.description: Sets the File Picker as required.

element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider
